verses.roman:
ei-mata bhaṭṭa-gṛhe rahe gauracandra
nirantara bhaṭṭa-saṅge kṛṣṇa-kathānanda

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; bhaṭṭa-gṛhe—in the house of Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa; rahe—remained; gauracandra—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nirantara—constantly; bhaṭṭa-saṅge—with Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa; kṛṣṇa-kathā-ānanda—the transcendental bliss of talking about Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained at the house of Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa and constantly talked with him about Lord Kṛṣṇa. In this way He was very happy.
